entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
